SEARCH
Module it.polimi.ingsw.gc12
Package it.polimi.ingsw.gc12.Model.ClientModel

Class ViewModel

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.gc12.Model.ClientModel.ViewModel
public class ViewModel extends Object
Represents the client's view model, managing the player's nickname related to the client, the list of game lobbies, and the current lobby or game if the player is in it.

  • Field Summary

    Modifier and Type

  • Field Details

    • CARDS_LIST

      public static final Map<Integer,ClientCard> CARDS_LIST
      The map of cards used to graphically represent them on the clients. Each client card is mapped to its unique ID for easy access.

  • Constructor Details

    • ViewModel

      public ViewModel()
      Constructs a new ViewModel with an empty nickname and no lobbies.

  • Method Details

    • clearModel

      public void clearModel()
      Clears this model instance, so that operations that need a fresh reboot can discard all the previous data.

    • getOwnNickname

      public String getOwnNickname()
      Gets the player's own nickname.
      Returns:
      the player's own nickname

      Sets the player's own nickname.
      Parameters:
      ownNickname - the new nickname

    • getLobbies

      public Map<UUID,Lobby> getLobbies()
      Gets the map containing all the open lobbies.
      Returns:
      the map containing the lobbies

      Sets the map of lobbies
      Parameters:
      lobbies - the new map of lobbies

    • putLobby

      public void putLobby(UUID lobbyUUID, Lobby lobby)
      Adds a lobby to the list of lobbies.
      Parameters:
      lobbyUUID - the unique identifier of the lobby
      lobby - the lobby to add

    • removeLobby

      public void removeLobby(UUID lobbyUUID)
      Removes a lobby from the list of lobbies.
      Parameters:
      lobbyUUID - the unique identifier of the lobby to remove

      public UUID getCurrentRoomUUID()
      Gets the UUID of the current lobby.

    • inRoom

      public boolean inRoom()
      Checks if the player is currently in a room (lobby or client game).
      Returns:
      true if the player is in a room, false otherwise

    • joinRoom

      public void joinRoom(Room room)
      Joins a room (lobby or client game).
      Parameters:
      room - the room to join

    • leaveRoom

      public void leaveRoom()
      Leaves the current room (lobby or client game).

    • getCurrentLobby

      public Lobby getCurrentLobby()
      Gets the current lobby the player is in. This method does not perform any check whether the player is actually in a lobby and not in a game. It only forces a cast into a GameLobby.
      Returns:
      the current lobby in which the player is in

    • getCurrentGame

      public ClientGame getCurrentGame()
      Gets the current game the player is in. This method does not perform any check whether the player is actually in a game and not in a lobby. It only forces a cast into a ClientGame.
      Returns:
      the current game in which the player is in
